#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define INF 1000000000
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,e,f,i,j,sum=0;
        scanf("%d %d %d",&e,&f,&n);
        int p,w,dp[f-e+1];
        dp[0]=0;
        for(i=1;i<=f-e;i++)
        {
            dp[i]=INF;
        }
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d %d",&p,&w);
            for(j=w;j<=f-e;j++)
            {
                dp[j]=min(dp[j],dp[j-w]+p);
            }
        }
        if(dp[f-e]!=INF)
        {
            printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",dp[f-e]);
        }
        else
        {
            printf("This is impossible.\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
